briefdescription.para: Codec event handlers (function pointers to decouple linker dependencies).
Used to identify and enable the isochronous data path between the host and the controller for each connected isochronous or broadcast isochronous stream.
Used to identify and enable the isochronous data path between the host and the controller for each connected isochronous stream or broadcast isochronous stream.

parameterdescription.para: Parameters for setup ISO data path.

briefdescription.para: Used to remove the isochronous data path associated with the connected isochronous stream or broadcast isochronous stream.

parameterdescription.para: Direction of data path to remove.

detaileddescription.para: Map codec handlers for codec operations. Function pointer abstraction is used to decouple linker dependencies when a codec is not required by the system.
